112.content:
Henry Johnson is a bit of a geek, with a twisted cruel streak. His favorite subjects are science, math, and fictional literature. He is twelve years old and like all boys around his age, he is extremely interested in sex and the human anatomy. He is bisexual, but heavily leans towards girls. His family consists of a lovely mom, a handsome dad, and three attractive sisters, one older, two younger. He is dressed in a Star Wars t-shirt and blue jeans. He is also carrying around a dark colored book bag. He is Caucasian and he wears glasses. He also has several assorted pets and a few carnivorous plants in his bedroom, along with many action figures.

On this day, Henry is busy collecting bugs and other small animals for his science class. As he walks around in a city park rummaging through some green foliage, he sees a UFO high in the sky. He notices something small and silver falling from it. He runs over to the location where it landed, and comes across a weird looking metallic space gun. Being a science fiction fanatic, he picks it up as he watches the UFO leave. Nobody else seems to have noticed the spaceship. As he holds the gun, telepathic instructions and alien commands flood his mind. He now knows what this gun can do and he knows what the aliens want him to do. Collect shrunken humans, send most of them back to the alien ship, and have fun with the rest.

Henry smiles wickedly, and tests the shrink gun out where first?
112.title: Henry finds a shrink ray gun.
